DEPLOYNOTES¶

Initial setup¶

  • Install python dependencies (virtualenv is recommended):

    pip install -r pip-install-req.txt

  • Copy libraryuse/localsettings.py.dist to libraryuse/localsettings.py and customize as needed.

  • Initialize the database:

    python manage.py syncdb python manage.py dbops –refresh-esd python manage.py dbops –refresh-libraryvisit
